title: Who Does the Sentence?
creator_credit: Peter Johnson, Coburg State College and Victorian association for the care and resettlement of offenders
brief_description: When a person is taken into custody, the family of the offender serve “a sentence” of another kind. The Victorian Association for the Care and Rehabilitation of Offenders (VACRO) tries to help these families in its own individual fashion. The film is noted for scenes actually filmed in Pentridge
